import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/Models/Product'; @Component({ selector: 'product-detail', templateUrl: './product-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-detail.component.css'] }) export class ProductDetailComponent { product: Product }
